attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst i agree that none smokers should be protected from passive smoking, I do not agree that the government have the legal right to breach our civil liberties by banning smoking when it is a perfectly legal pastime,one that the government receives an enormous amount of tax from.
I therefore petition the government to allow establishments that dont serve food to allow smoking in designated areas i.e. smoke rooms and dedicated rooms in public houses

rejection.details: The title does not incorporate the point of the petition and it's similar to the following: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoFoodNoBan/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
